Name: ACA NEO GEO THE LAST BLADE
Battle Chef Brigade
Comments: It's Excellent." - Singularity

Name: Celeste
Comments: It's one of the best ever 2D platformers. Tons of content as well." - Duffking

Name: Darkest Dungeon
Comments: Really challening and atmospheric, but will last you and age and is really good fun" - Duffking

Name: Dead Cells
Comments: Great game, but be warned the Switch version has a lot of performance issues. Still playable though." - Duffking

Name: Death Squared
Comments: Another good co-op puzzler." - rwklau

Name: Enter the Gungeon
Comments: It's better than Isaac, for me. Be warned that the Switch version has performance issues when it gets busy. It's also significantly harder than Isaac, so you're less likely to get carried through by RNG." - Duffking

Name: Fast RMX
Comments: High speed racing. If you want F-Zero, look no further." - DakeyrasUK

Name: Fortnite
Comments: A free download for the most popular shoot'em up on the planet.

Name: Gorogoa
Comments: Chilled puzzle game. Quite different to anything else I have played and very clever. (But over priced)." - PazJohnMitch

Name: Graceful Explosion Machine
Comments: An addicitive side-scrolling shooter that offers it's own take on the Defender formula." - Dangerous_Dave87

Name: Has Been Heroes
Comments:
I'm surprised it actually got included on the list at all, but I genuinely loved it." - BigOrkWaaagh
"Very high learning curve but awesome if you can get over it" - rice_sandwich

Name: Hollow Knight
Comments: Awesome Metroidvania game. Must play." - PazJohnMitch

Name: Hyper Sentinel
Comments: For those nostalgic for the C=64 era." - rwklau

Name: I Am Setsuna
Comments: For fans of old school turn based JRPGs. You get a good 30hrs of gameplay for what is fun, if not unique fable." - DakeyrasUK

Name: Iconoclasts
Comments: This is a really nice semi-metroidvania with great boss battles by the way, seems to have flown under a lot of people's radar. The writing is iffy though." - Duffking

Name: Into the Breach
Comments: Great roguelike and the best strategy game on Switch" - Duffking

Name: Inversus
Comments: Nice co-op and 2 player options" - rice_sandwich

Name: Jack Box Party (1 - 4)
Comments: Great for a large gathering of friends, making the most of everyone having smart phones in the modern age. Lots of laughter is assured when you start answering with you in jokes you share with your opponents." - DakeyrasUK

Name: Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes
Comments: Don't let the awful trailer distract you from the concept of the game!

Name: Lumines Remastered
Comments:
An eternal classic that will make your hands very happy at the rumble implementation." - Jivehound
"Really, really easy to get lost in this game for hours at a time in my expirence. And easy to pick up and play as well." - Duffking

Name: Minit
Comments: 15% off if you own Enter the Gungeon, Crossing Souls, Not a Hero or The Messenger.

Name: N++
Comments: Smooth and minimalist ninja platform challenges, with style and good tunes." - erniewhatbert

Name: Oceanhorn
Comments: A great homage to Zelda: Wind Waker. Kept me entertained for me than 15 hours." - DakeyrasUK

Name: Overcooked! Special Edition
Comments: A great multiplayer game that doesn't require any gaming experience. Expect many arguements!" - Dangerous_Dave87

Name: Paladins
Comments: A free download that runs at 60fps! One for fans of Overwatch.

Name: Picross S
Comments:
Picross is a great puzzle type. This collection is far to easy though. (Except for the last 15 puzzles.)" - PazJohnMitch 
"The perfect brain teaser for the commute or before bed." - Dangerous_Dave87

Name: Piczle Lines DX
Comments: Mobile port. Hundreds of number link puzzles. Calming" - rice_sandwich

Name: Pinball FX 3
Comments: Free Download that comes with 1 table. Additional tables purchases seperately.

Name: Portal Bridge Builder
Comments: Some fiendish puzzles but there are multiple solutions. Trial and error gameplay but I like that in this set up." - PazJohnMitch

Name: Puyo Puyo Tetris
Comments: Love couch multiplayer shenanigans? Then get this game to take part in the mash up madness. Has an utterly barmy campaign story, too!" - DakeyrasUK

Name: Snake Pass
Comments: Intentionally fiendish movement controls that are rewarding to master. Sadly the camera controls are also challenging." - PazJohnMitch

Name: Snipperclips: Cut it out Together!
Comments:
A charming little puzzle game that requires the cooperation of others. May lead to arguements!" - Dangerous_Dave87
"Brilliant couch co op fun. You will be sure to descend into pissing each other off and laughing your heads off." - DakeyrasUK

Name: Sonic Mania
Comments: Old school Megadrive Sonic but better." - PazJohnMitch

Name: Stardew Valley
Comments:
An incredibly addictive farming simulator that's easy to unwind with." - Dangerous_Dave87
"Like Harvest Moon, but better!" - PazJohnMitch

Name: Steamworld Dig 2
Comments: A great Metroidvania sequel that doesn't require experience of the original." - Dangerous_Dave87

Name: Steamworld Heist: Ultimate Edition
Comments: Second best strategy game on Switch. Full of character as well." - Duffking

Name: The Flame in the Flood: Complete Edition
The Messenger
Comments: It has some of the tightest controls I've seen in ages and basically feels like playing an improved version of the old 2D Ninja Gaiden games." - CalamityJames

Name: Thimbleweed Park
Comments: A supurb throwback to adventure games/click and point puzzle games of the past. Think Monkey Island, Full Throttle, Broken Sword." - DakeyrasUK

Name: Uurnog Uurnlimited
Comments: What a weird game. It's oddly enjoyable if slightly unfathomable" - rice_sandwich

Name: Yoku's Island Express
Comments: 2018 GOTY" - rice_sandwich
